characters.name: Homer
characters.dialogue:
Bart! Doh I've been stabbed. 
 Homer dies on the floor.

characters.name: Ned
characters.dialogue:
Hi didly ho Bart! Homers dead? Oh no! I knew my satan sense was tingling. I did see someone walking towards the Kwik-E-Mart down the street. 
 Investigate the Kwik-E-Mart using the car.

characters.name: Smithers
characters.dialogue: Hello Bart. What are you doing here? Homers dead?
